html:
Kali Uchis has announced her first headlining arena tour. The Sincerely, Tour, named after the singer’s newly released album, begins on Thursday, August 14, and is currently slated to conclude on Thursday, September 25. Supporting Uchis on tour are Thee Sacred Souls. See the North American tour dates below.

Uchis released Sincerely, on May 9. She previewed her follow-up to Orquídeas with the singles “Sunshine & Rain…” and “ILYSMIH.” In addition, to coincide with the album’s release, she shared the music video for “All I Can Say.” Watch that clip below.
